page.title: 11CRANFORD COMMUNITY SCHOOL
page.content: to provide toys and games for the playgroup. Some pupils in the school help in the creche and playgroup as part of their Child Care and Community Studies courses. The school has a large sports complex. There are two upstairs halls. Downstairs there is a large sports hall, which holds four basketball courts and one court all the length of the hall for special matches. The complex also has a multigym and several squash courts. Clubs are held both during school time and in the evenings, as well as in the holidays for pupils and the community. Some of these include the following activities:badminton, weight-training, tennis, Aikido, archery, volleyball and fencing. Anybody can become a member of the community school and then use these facilities.
